Subjects: laments; Peter of Birmingham, lord Tethmoy, death of; Ireland, English settlement of
_description: Sir Pers of Birmingham — in 6-line stanzas (aabccb)

BLHar913.First Lines: Sith Gabriel gan gretevre ledi mari swete…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…And god pardon ibouȝttwo hundred daies and
                    mo
BLHar913.Note:
132 lines; nineteenth-century transcript, London,  British Library Addit. 20091, ff.
                        50v-57v.

BLLan418.First Lines: Sith Gabriell gan greteUre ladi mari swete…
BLLan418.Last Lines: …And god pardon ibroghtTwo hundred daies & mo
BLLan418.Note:
note: ‘Out of a smale olde book in parchment called the book of
                    Rosse or of Waterford’ (f. 88). This copy was made in 1608. Folio number
                    reflects the most recent foliation.
